page.title: 16CHILTON CANTELO SCHOOL.
page.content: This is an Independent School with 100+ pupils aged from 11 to 18 years. As it is mainly for children whose parents are in the Armed Forces and move from place to place. The majority are boarders from such countries as France, Holland, Nigeria and different parts of the British Isles. The school is based in the old Manor House which once belonged to the Goodford Family. The oldest part dates back to 1700 and is set in 20 acres of ground. A full range of lessons are taught both academic and practical with the opportunity to take G.C.E. at 'O'and 'A' level. Physical activities are encouraged making full use of the rugby pitch, tennis courts and outdoor swimming pool. The school has its own Sea Cadet Unit and Fire Brigade complete with engine and necessary equipment.
